item.title: Twitter Updates for 2009-11-15
item.dc:creator: Brian Kirsten
item.content:encoded:
• Day one complete safe and sound in Richmond, VA. #
  • Sonoma enjoying the heavenly bed #
  • Somewhere in Maryland I noticed the sign "Decoy Museum", does that mean the real museum is nearby? #
  • Day 2 of our adventure! Off to Orlando! Just have to drive through 4 states today! #

Powered by Twitter Tools
